name: Ultimate Island Trek
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Ultimate Island Trek ===
Ultimate Island Trek VISIT A BEAUTIFUL WHITSUNDAY ISLAND – DELICIOUS WOODFIRED PIZZA LUNCH – 1 HOUR RESORT STOPOVER – 3 HOURS JETSKIING Jetski to a beautiful Whitsunday Island Solo riders will love this epic adventure as you journey to the island oasis of a Whitsunday Island. Enjoy a beautiful poolside lunch including woodfired pizzas, salads and chips. Relax with a drink, take a dip in the pool or chill on the beach, before the thrills are amplified on the return journey, delivering more scenic splendour exploring numerous islands and resorts as you conquer the ultimate 70km trek. Video Inclusions Times Price Checklist Tour includes: Approximately 3 hours of thrilling jetskiing Poolside pizza lunch Informative and entertaining commentary by qualified tour guide Sea turtles, dugongs, seabirds and seasonal humpback whales (July – September) are often encountered on tours All riding apparel including lifejackets, rash tops/thermal tops, wetsuit shorts, polarised sunglasses, riding hats and sunscreen provided All photos of your tour provided free of charge on Facebook Free courtesy bus pick up and drop off within Airlie Beach area TIME: 5 Hours DURATION: 4 hours jetskiing plus 1 hour briefing and check in PRICE: $495 per jetski – SOLO RIDERS ONLY Tour is only available for private charter (minimum 6 jetskis) QLD Public Holiday surcharge of $20 per jetski applies in addition to above price What to bring: Casual clothes Bathers Sunscreen Towel Camera YOUR JETSKI ADVENTURE CHECKLIST: Understand English Must be able to swim wearing a lifejacket Solo riders only with a minimum age of 16 years and over for the Ultimate Island Trek tour Above average fitness level and confidence in open waters Big smiles and sense of adventure!! THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW: Our ADVENTURE TOURS operate daily in most weather conditions A reasonable level of fitness is required, as some conditions can be physically demanding Please consider your suitability to your chosen tour Bring along swimmers, towel and sunscreen (like a day at the beach) A dry bag will be provided for your towel, phone/camera Thorough safety briefing and demonstrations provided by qualified tour guides Fully supervised at all times by one or two guides, depending on numbers Weight restrictions apply, maximum 200kg per jetski If under 18 years of age, an indemnity form must be signed by parent or guardian prior to tour Group bookings are available Gift vouchers are available As a wind guide: 10 knots – smooth, dry ride, 15 knots – partly smooth some choppy small waves, 20 knots plus – choppy water spray and large waves. Management reserve the right to change itinerary or times in extreme weather conditions. Solo riders will love this epic adventure as you journey to the island oasis of a Whitsunday Island. Enjoy a beautiful poolside lunch including woodfired pizzas, salads and chips. Relax with a drink, take a dip in the pool or chill on the beach, before the thrills are amplified on the return journey, delivering more scenic splendour exploring numerous islands and resorts as you conquer the ultimate 70km trek.

name: Two Island Safari Tour
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Two Island Safari Tour ===
Two Island Safari Tour OPEN WATER JETSKIING – CRUISE DAYDREAM AND SOUTH MOLLE ISLANDS Whitsunday Tours A great tour for the more adventurous traveller who wants to maximise their time on the water. This is one of the best Whitsunday tours you can choose for a mix of scenery and adventure…explore the beautiful Whitsunday Islands including the scenic waterways around Daydream and South Molle Islands while pausing for photos, power snacks and the occasional marine life encounter. Video Inclusions Times Price Checklist Tour includes: Approximately 2 hours of action packed jetskiing Informative and entertaining commentary by qualified tour guide Sea turtles, dugongs, seabirds and seasonal humpback whales (July – September) are often encountered on tours All riding apparel including lifejackets, rash tops/thermal tops, wetsuit shorts, polarised sunglasses, riding hats and sunscreen provided Power snacks and bottled water All photos of your tour provided free of charge on Facebook Free courtesy bus pick up and drop off within Airlie Beach area TIME: MORNING TOUR: 9.30am – 12.30pm AFTERNOON TOUR: 12.00pm – 3.00pm DURATION: 2 hours jetskiing plus 1 hour briefing and check in PRICE: $329 per jetski or $164.50 per person twin shareQLD Public Holiday surcharge of $20 per jetski applies What to bring: Casual clothes Bathers Sunscreen Towel Camera YOUR JETSKI ADVENTURE CHECKLIST: Understand English Must be able to swim wearing a lifejacket Minimum passenger age of 12 years and over Minimum driver age – 12 years and over when accompanied by an adult who is 18 years and over Above average fitness level and confidence in open waters Big smiles and sense of adventure!! THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW: Our ADVENTURE TOURS operate daily in most weather conditions A reasonable level of fitness is required, as some conditions can be physically demanding Please consider your suitability to your chosen tour Bring along swimmers, towel and sunscreen (like a day at the beach) Thorough safety briefing and demonstrations provided by qualified tour guides Fully supervised at all times by one or two guides, depending on numbers Weight restrictions apply, maximum of 2 people per jetski or 200kg per jetski If under 18 years of age, an indemnity form must be signed by parent or guardian prior to tour Group bookings are available for up to 12 jetskis per tour (maximum of 24 people) Gift vouchers are available As a wind guide: 10 knots – smooth, dry ride, 15 knots – partly smooth some choppy small waves, 20 knots plus – choppy water spray and large waves. Management reserve the right to change itinerary or times in extreme weather conditions. QLD Public Holiday surcharge of $20 per jetski applies Children 12 years and above can drive the jetski when accompanied by an adult who is 18 years and over 100% cancellation up to 6pm the night before travel Book Online Now Whitsunday Jetski Tours Tripadvisor Traveller Rating 5,557 reviews Tripadvisor Ranking # 4 of 135 Tours in Airlie Beach Recent Traveller Reviews “A must have adventure” “Jet Skiing Fun” “Extremely well organised and yet fun and...” “Great activity!” “Wow, what an incredible experience” Read reviews Write a review

name: Airlie Adventure Tour
description: This Airlie Beach jet ski tour offers a mix of adrenalin and eco adventure. Drive your own jetski to view the islands from the protection of the coast.
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Airlie Adventure Tour ===
A perfect mix of adrenalin and eco adventure. Drive your own jetski out to view the Whitsunday Islands from the protection of the coastline, before exploring Airlie’s beautiful bays and enjoying some turtle spotting. Airlie Adventure Tour ISLAND VIEWS – BAYS WITH SEA TURTLE ENCOUNTERS – 1.5 HOURS JETSKIING Airlie Beach Jet Ski Tour This popular Airlie Beach jet ski tour is suitable for everyone….. a perfect mix of adrenalin and eco adventure. Drive your own jetski out to view the Whitsunday Islands from the protection of the coastline, before exploring Airlie’s beautiful bays and enjoying some turtle spotting. This tour is accessible.  For more information, visit our accessibility page or contact us directly. Video Inclusions Times Price Checklist This Tour includes: Approximately 1.5 hours of fun-filled jetskiing Informative and entertaining commentary by qualified tour guide Sea turtles, dugongs, seabirds and seasonal humpback whales (July – September) are often encountered on tours All riding apparel including lifejackets, rash tops/thermal tops, wetsuit shorts, polarised sunglasses, riding hats and sunscreen provided Bottled water All photos of your tour provided free of charge on Facebook Free courtesy bus pick up and drop off within Airlie Beach area TIME: MORNING TOUR: 7.30am – 10.00am AFTERNOON TOUR: 2.30pm – 5.00pm DURATION: 1.5 hours jetskiing plus 1 hour briefing and check in PRICE: $259 per jetski or $129.50 per person twin shareQLD Public Holiday surcharge of $20 per jetski applies What you need to bring: Casual clothes Bathers Sunscreen Towel Camera YOUR JETSKI ADVENTURE CHECKLIST: Understand English Must be able to swim wearing a lifejacket Minimum driver age – 8 years when accompanied by an adult who is 18 years and over Big smiles and sense of adventure!! THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW: Our ADVENTURE TOURS operate daily in most weather conditions A reasonable level of fitness is required, as some conditions can be physically demanding Please consider your suitability to your chosen tour Bring along swimmers, towel and sunscreen (like a day at the beach) Thorough safety briefing and demonstrations provided by qualified tour guides Fully supervised at all times by one or two guides, depending on numbers Weight restrictions apply, maximum of 2 people per jetski or 200kg per jetski Minimum driver age – 8 years when accompanied by an adult who is 18 years and over If under 18 years of age, an indemnity form must be signed by parent or guardian prior to tour Group bookings are available for up to 12 jetskis per tour (maximum of 24 people) Gift vouchers are available As a wind guide: 10 knots – smooth, dry ride, 15 knots – partly smooth some choppy small waves, 20 knots plus – choppy water spray and large waves. Management reserve the right to change itinerary or times in extreme weather conditions.
